commentary:
This is similar in meaning to the nama no 19- ‘नवचम्पक-पुष्पाभ-नासदण्ड-विराजिताऽ। (‘Navacampaka-puṣpābha-nāsadaṇḍa-virājitā’.) This name subtly hints at the importance of Pranayama.

Having described Mother Goddess Gayatri’s face, we will here after understand about Gayatri upasana, definition and practical application of yoga, yoga in everyday life etc.
